Pageviews by browser (past 24 hours)
Source
Here should be an areachart.

html

<div tbk-keen-areachart-demo-pageviews-by-browser>
  Loading Pageviews By Browsers Areachart Demo.
</div>

directive

.directive('tbkKeenAreachartDemoPageviewsByBrowser', [function() {
  var d = {
    controller: ['$scope', 'tbkKeen', function($scope, Keen) {
      $scope.query = new Keen.Query("count", {
        eventCollection: "pageviews",
        interval: "hourly",
        groupBy: "user.device_info.browser.family",
        timeframe: {
          start: "2014-05-04T00:00:00.000Z",
          end: "2014-05-05T00:00:00.000Z"
        }
      });

      $scope.chartOptions = {
        chartArea: {
          height: "85%",
          left: "5%",
          top: "5%",
          width: "80%"
        },
        isStacked: true
      };
    }],
    template:
    '<div data-tbk-keen-areachart ' +
    ' query="query" ' +
    ' height="250" ' +
    ' width="auto" ' +
    ' chart-options="chartOptions" ' +
    '></div<'
  };

  return d;
}])
This is a sample text region to describe this chart.
